Html:
I downloaded a sample and tried to convert it to VS 2010, the conversion failed and I didn't choose the option to take a backup.

 

I deleted the file, but, when I go back to the sample, I can't see a way to redownload, I only have the "open" button and pressing this causes a popup box to appear that simply says..

 

Error Occurs

The code sample entryfile path does not exist, please check in: C:\xxxx.

Close.

 

Is there any easy way to redownload projects?
